long_description: The Eagle Creek Sandman Eyeshade is softly molded to comfortably block out light for easier sleeping on a train, plan, car or even in your own bed. Contoured shape allows natural blinking and eliminates pressure on your eyes. Polyester microfleece is soft and comfortable against your skin. Wide, adjustable elastic strap offers a personalized fit.
short_description: The Eagle Creek Sandman Eyeshade is softly molded to comfortably block out light for easier sleeping on a train, plan, car or even in your own bed.
